greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = a(1)*a(n-1) + a(2)*a(n-2) + ...+ a(n-1)*a(1) for n >= 3.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
Rigoberto Flórez, Leandro Junes, José L. Ramírez, Further Results on Paths in an n-Dimensional Cubic Lattice, Journal of Integer Sequences, Vol. 21 (2018), Article 18.1.2.
formula: D-finite with recurrence n*a(n) = (12*n-18)*a(n-1) - 32*(n-3)*a(n-2) - _Richard Choulet_, Dec 17 2009
a(n+1) = GegenbauerC(n-1, -n, -3)/n for n>=1. - _Peter Luschny_, May 09 2016
program: (PARI) {a(n)=if(n<2, 3*(n==1), n--; polcoeff( serreverse( x/(1+6*x+x^2) +x*O(x^n) ), n))} /* _Michael Somos_, Oct 14 2006 */
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
